channel.title: Hillvue Heights Church Worship VideoCast
channel.itunes:subtitle: Connecting, Healing and Developing through Jesus
channel.itunes:author: Hillvue Heights Church - Pastor Steve Ayers

itunes:owner.itunes:name: Hillvue Heights Church - Pastor Steve Ayers

channel.description: This vodcast delivers the Hillvue Heights Sunday worship experience in two parts each week. (One video for the sermon and one video of the praise and worship music.) You'll also receive occasional videos of special events, such as our Godstock event or sermon illustration videos. Additional archives can be found at www.hillvue.com. (Please note that the spelling is Hillvue, and not Hillview.)
channel.itunes:summary: This vodcast delivers the Hillvue Heights Sunday worship experience in two parts each week. (One video of the sermon and one video of the praise and worship music.) You'll also receive occasional videos of special events, such as our Godstock event or sermon illustration videos. Additional archives can be found at www.hillvue.com. (Please note that the spelling is Hillvue, and not Hillview.)
